function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cognitive load and sharing unverified covid-19 information","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and political implication in disease prevention","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on scientific evidence without public awareness and political commitment","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to comply with social distancing and hygiene measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to non-compliance with preventive measures.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and containment measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in public venues and attractions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and education regarding disease prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in fear of the virus leading to reduced compliance with measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compliance with lockdown measures influenced by fear of disease, moral support, and social norms.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower self-control leading to non-compliance with lockdown measures.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concordance between self-reported and objective compliance measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unobserved differences affecting study outcomes","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Response biases in self-reported compliance data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Opportunity to violate measures leading to noncompliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impulsivity associated with noncompliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive association between social norms and compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to comply with measures due to lack of resources or knowledge.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No relation between negative emotions and compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation for severity of deterrence with compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to analyze changes in behavior due to single moment measurement","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixed results on the relationship between moral support for measures and compliant behavior","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender and trust in science correlate with compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived threat, moral alignment, and impulsivity correlate with compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Descriptive social norms correlate with compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between compliance and perceived threat, specific moral alignment, negative emotions, and other factors.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative correlation between compliance and opportunity to violate, impulsivity, and non-normative ool.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on self-reported compliance data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with covid-19 measures due to impulsivity","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low descriptive social norms for compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have low practical capacity to comply with covid-19 mitigation measures, as indicated by the measures of their ability to comply with the measures and the opportunity to violate them.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have limited knowledge of the current covid-19 mitigation measures, leading to non-compliance and misinformation.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may perceive the covid-19 measures as unclear, leading to confusion and potential non-compliance.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived certainty of punishment for violating covid-19 measures may influence compliance behavior and risk perception.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measurement of capacity to comply with covid-19 measures involves subjective assessments that may not accurately reflect actual behavior and adherence.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor compliance due to perceived negative impact","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived threat of coronavirus","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with pandemic measures due to perceptions of procedural fairness and justice","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of limited choice leading to compliance out of coercion and fear","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to non-compliant behavior","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of descriptive social norm on compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to deterrent effect of measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to lack of capacity to comply","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adversity and coping strategies in startups","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers in policy support services for startups","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation and flexibility","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of prior research on tendency and awareness towards fake news.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexplored social media use of recovered covid-19 cases.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
